name: extract-i18n
shortDescription: Extracts i18n messages from source code.

options.name: build-target
options.description: A builder target to extract i18n messages in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

options.name: configuration
options.description:
One or more named builder configurations as a comma-separated list as specified in the "configurations" section in angular.json.
The builder uses the named configurations to run the given target.
For more information, see https://angular.dev/reference/configs/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations.

options.name: format
options.description: Output format for the generated file.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: out-file
options.description: Name of the file to output.

options.name: output-path
options.description: Path where output will be placed.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an application or a library.
